overview: Paris by night by Liza Del Sierra! The beautiful cruises the city by scooter and goes to meet 4 French actresses, who are also his girlfriends in the middle. This intimacy allows much more confidences and follies in front of the camera! The tone changes drastically from other episodes of the collection "Liza loves ...". We discover girls in places that are familiar to them and we meet a lot of amateurs, happy passers-by who were there at the right time, and even Katia DÃ© Lys as a stripper, all shot in camera! Many fantasies will be satisfied. Sixth collaboration between Liza and Colmax production, not to be missed!
title: Liza loves French Girls
